name: Dodie in Toronto
description:
Join Dodie's 2026 tour, featuring their empowering latest release. 

Beloved for its uplifting anthems and bold messages, this release has had streams in the millions and dominates playlists worldwide. 

With sold-out shows like their recent multi-stop frenzy, Dodie brings new age vibes to Toronto's progressive heart. 

This concert will invite self-expression and inclusivity, resonating with Ontario's forward-thinking community. Fans will sing along to tracks that celebrate individuality, touched by the album's demanding call to be truly you.
